title: From Vajpayee to Modi, Mulayam to Yogi: The changing politics of iftar parties - The Indian Express
content:
1. From Vajpayee to Modi, Mulayam to Yogi: The changing politics of iftar parties  The Indian Express
  2. Fact check: This picture of Nehru doesn’t show ‘first post-Independence Iftar party’  The Hindu
  3. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The near-disappearance of the iftar culture from the political landscape is being seen as a sign of the distance India's politics has travelled over the last few years, a shift that is being attributed to the dominance of the BJP in national politics.
